member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcrRecognitionMode
member.summary: Specifies available recognition modes of Tesseract OCR.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcrRecognitionMode.Quality
member.summary: Tesseract OCR will provide the best recognition result. Default.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcrRecognitionMode.Speed
member.summary: Tesseract OCR will provide the best recognition speed.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcrSettings
member.summary: Contains the settings for Tesseract OCR engine.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcrSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: This constructor uses English language for text recognition.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcrSettings.#ctor(Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrLanguage)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Language, which should be used for text recognition.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcrSettings.#ctor(Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrLanguage[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Languages, which should be used for text recognition.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The SerializationInfo to populate with data.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcrSettings.UseCustomDictionaries
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the OCR engine should use the custom dictionaries.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcrSettings.CustomDictionarySuffix
member.summary: Gets or sets the filename suffix of a custom dictionary.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcrSettings.RecognitionMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the recognition mode of Tesseract OCR.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcrSettings.CharWhiteList
member.summary: Gets or sets the whitelist of characters in recognized text.
member.value:
null - recognized text may contain any character; not null - recognized text may contain only specified characters.
Default value is null.
For example, string "1234567890" means that recognized text may contain digits only.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcrSettings.MaxBlobOverlaps
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of blobs (titles, paragraphs) a big blob can overlap.
member.exception: Thrown if value is less than 0.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcrSettings.Clone
member.summary: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
member.returns: A new object that is a copy of this instance.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcrSettings.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Populates a SerializationInfo with the data needed to serialize the target object.
member.param: The SerializationInfo to populate with data.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Allows an to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the Object is reclaimed by garbage collection.

member.summary: Gets the path to the Tesseract4.Vintasoft.xXX.dll.

member.summary: Returns the recognition languages.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcr.Init(Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngineSettings)
member.summary: Initializes the Tesseract OCR engine.
member.returns: true - OCR engine is successfully initialized; false - OCR engine is NOT initialized.
member.exception: Thrown if directory with Tesseract OCR data is not found OR Tesseract OCR is not initialized.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcr.SetImage(Vintasoft.Imaging.VintasoftImage)
member.summary: Sets the current image for recognition.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcr.ClearImage
member.summary: Clears the current image, which is specified by the method.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcr.Recognize
member.summary: Recognizes the current image and returns the result as .

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcr.Shutdown
member.summary: Shutdowns the OCR engine.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcr.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the object.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcr.GetVariable(System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Gets a value of boolean variable of Tesseract API.
member.returns: true if value of variable is successfully received; false, otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown if OCR engine is not initialized yet.
member.remarks: Method must be executed before executing of this method.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Tesseract.TesseractOcr.GetVariable(System.String,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Gets a value of integer variable of Tesseract API.
member.returns: true if value of variable is successfully received; false, otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown if OCR engine is not initialized yet.
member.remarks: Method must be executed before executing of this method.

member.summary: Gets a value of double variable of Tesseract API.
member.returns: true if value of variable is successfully received; false, otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown if OCR engine is not initialized yet.
member.remarks: Method must be executed before executing of this method.

member.summary: Gets a value of string variable of Tesseract API.
member.returns: true if value of variable is successfully received; false, otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown if OCR engine is not initialized yet.
member.remarks: Method must be executed before executing of this method.

member.summary: Sets a value of boolean variable of Tesseract API.
member.returns: true if value of variable is successfully set; false, otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown if OCR engine is not initialized yet.
member.remarks: Method must be executed before executing of this method.
